reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting the provision of health care to the needy Palestinians in the Gaza Strip.

description.narrative: Critical and life-saving drugs are provided to 23,000 patients, including 6,600 women, 6,800 men, 4,700 girls, and 4,900 boys. - 35,000 beneficiaries - girls, 18,200, and boys 16,800 - reached. - 700 health workers - 350 women - 350 men to be trained
Improving the provision of health care services to more than one and a half million needy Palestinians in UNRWA health centers and local hospitals.
Providing health care to the needy Palestinians in the Gaza Strip.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
The United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East (UNRWA)
